results.description: FAW chief Jonathan Ford says it will be up to Welsh players to decide if they want to play for Team GB in the Tokyo Olympics.
results.shortTitle: Team GB choice down to Wales players - Ford
results.title: Team GB choice down to Wales players - FAW chief Jonathan Ford

results.description: Injured Jess Fishlock focuses on returning to fitness to help Wales' Euro 2021 qualifying campaign, but backs Team GB at Tokyo 2020.
results.shortTitle: Fishlock focused on Wales but backs Team GB
results.title: Jess Fishlock: Injured midfielder focused on Wales but sees benefits of Team GB

results.description: Great Britain will have a women's football team at the 2020 Olympics after England finished in the top three European teams at the World Cup.
results.shortTitle: GB qualify for Olympic women's football
results.title: Tokyo 2020 Olympics: Team GB qualify for women's football tournament

results.description: Scotland midfielder Kim Little has called for a Great Britain women's football team at the 2020 Olympic Games in Tokyo, saying it will help "enhance and develop" the sport in the UK.
results.shortTitle: Little wants GB team at 2020 Olympics
results.title: Tokyo Olympics 2020: Kim Little wants GB women's football team

results.description: Scotland midfielder Kim Little hopes a compromise can be found so a Great Britain team competes at the 2020 Olympic Games.
results.shortTitle: Little calls for Team GB in Tokyo
results.title: Scotland's Kim Little calls for Team GB football team to play at Tokyo Olympics

results.description: The team have replaced names with messages from inspirational women around the world.
results.shortTitle: Swedish women's team drop their names
results.title: Swedish women's football team swaps names for inspirational messages on shirts

results.description: A mum who was broke, homeless and suicidal wins young achiever of the year at the Pride of Britain Awards after turning her life around.
results.shortTitle: Meet the mum who became a young achiever
results.title: Pride of Britain Awards: Meet the 25-year-old mum who became a young achiever

results.description: Wales midfielder Jess Fishlock would like to see a Great Britain's women's football team playing at the Olympics but does not expect it to happen.
